skill.name: optimizing-performance
skill.description: Analyzes and optimizes application performance across frontend, backend, and database layers. Use when diagnosing slowness, improving load times, optimizing queries, reducing bundle size, or when asked about performance issues.
skill.summary: Analyzes and optimizes application performance across frontend, backend, and database layers. Use wh...
skill.author: CloudAI-X

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based markdown skill with no executable code. Contains only guidance, code examples, and best practices for performance optimization. No network calls, filesystem access, or command execution capabilities.

content.value_statement: Slow applications frustrate users and hurt business metrics. This skill provides a systematic approach to diagnose performance bottlenecks and apply targeted optimizations across frontend, backend, and database layers.
actual_capabilities: Analyze CPU, memory, I/O, and database performance bottlenecks
Apply frontend optimizations including bundle splitting and memoization
Implement multi-layer caching strategies with Redis and in-memory caches
Optimize database queries to eliminate N+1 problems
Profile code using Node.js, Python, and Lighthouse tools
Apply algorithm optimizations from O(n²) to O(n) complexity
limitations: Cannot automatically modify your codebase without explicit permission
Cannot access external APIs or third-party services for you
Cannot run profiling tools on your machine directly
Does not provide real-time monitoring or alerting

use_cases.title: Speed up web applications
use_cases.description: Reduce bundle sizes, implement lazy loading, and optimize rendering performance for faster user experiences.

use_cases.title: Optimize server performance
use_cases.description: Identify database bottlenecks, implement caching layers, and convert blocking operations to asynchronous processing.

use_cases.title: End-to-end performance audits
use_cases.description: Measure baseline metrics, identify bottlenecks across all layers, and validate improvements with before-after comparisons.

prompt_templates.title: Quick Performance Check
prompt_templates.prompt: My application is running slowly. Help me identify the most likely bottlenecks and suggest where to start optimizing.

prompt_templates.title: Frontend Optimization
prompt_templates.prompt: My web page has poor Lighthouse scores. How can I optimize my bundle size, implement code splitting, and improve Core Web Vitals?

prompt_templates.title: Database Tuning
prompt_templates.prompt: My database queries are slow. Help me identify N+1 query problems and rewrite them with proper JOINs or pagination.

prompt_templates.title: Full Performance Audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Perform a complete performance audit of my application. Include profiling approach, bottleneck identification, optimization strategies, and validation methods.

output_examples.input: My Node.js API is slow and timing out under load
output: 1. Profile CPU usage with node --prof to identify hot functions
2. Check for blocking I/O operations in request handlers
3. Implement Redis caching for frequently accessed data
4. Convert long-running operations to background queue jobs
5. Add database query indexing and connection pooling
6. Set up multi-layer cache: memory L1, Redis L2, database L3

best_practices: Always measure baseline performance before optimizing to avoid premature optimization
Use the right profiling tool for the right layer: Lighthouse for web, cProfile for Python, node --prof for Node.js
Apply targeted optimizations based on actual bottlenecks, not assumptions
anti_patterns: Optimizing code without data - never guess where bottlenecks exist
Importing entire libraries when only specific functions are needed
Running blocking operations synchronously in request handlers

faq.question: Which programming languages does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill covers JavaScript, Python, and general web performance concepts applicable to any language.

faq.question: What performance metrics does it focus on?
faq.answer: Web Vitals (LCP, FID, CLS, TTFB), API latency (P50/P95/P99), and algorithmic time complexity.

faq.question: Can this skill integrate with profiling tools?
faq.answer: Yes, it provides guidance for Node.js --prof, Python cProfile, and Google Lighthouse integration.

faq.question: Is my code or data accessed during optimization?
faq.answer: No. This skill only provides guidance. You control when and how any code changes are applied.

faq.question: What if optimizations do not improve performance?
faq.answer: Return to the identification step and profile again. Multiple bottleneck types often require iterative fixes.

faq.question: How is this different from generic code review?
faq.answer: This skill focuses specifically on performance metrics, profiling techniques, and optimization patterns rather than code quality.
